entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 40%

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
